attributes.action: Boxley Road, Maidstone Zebra Crossing, Kent
attributes.additional_details:
Have the goverment implement some kind of road safety measures to stop drivers ignoring the Zebra Crossing on Boxley Road, Maidstone, Kent, between Sailsbury Road and Grandville Road. And stop so many people speeding round the corner opposite Boxley Gardens, just up from the above zebra crossing.
This Petetition asks to either reduce the road speed to 20 mph with a speed camera, road humps or change the zebra crossing to traffic lights.
 People ignore the fact there are 3 schools in the area and so many near misses!
